name: Windows Manage Process Migration
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>
phra <https://iwantmore.pizza>
description:
This module will migrate a Meterpreter session from one process
        to another. A given process PID to migrate to or the module can spawn one and
        migrate to that newly spawned process.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: SPAWN
options.description: Spawn process to migrate to. If set, notepad.exe is used.

options.name: PID
options.description: PID of process to migrate to.

options.name: PPID
options.description: Process Identifier for PPID spoofing when creating a new process. (0 = no PPID spoofing).

options.name: PPID_NAME
options.description: Name of process for PPID spoofing when creating a new process.

options.name: NAME
options.description: Name of process to migrate to.

options.name: KILL
options.description: Kill original process for the session.
